Title: 37562 - # Reasons You Should Consider Insuring Your Electronics
Direction: 500 words: Discuss 3-6 different reasons that someone might benefit from getting insurance for their electronics. Discuss how laptops, flat screen TVs and game consoles can break or go bad before you're ready and able to upgrade. You can use examples like a surge protector failing and having an electrical storm zap your computer, etc. Discuss how having insurance could help you save money and protect your valuable pieces of technology in the long run. You should also suggest shopping around for the best deals on electronic insurance and mention how important it is to read the reviews on an insurance company before choosing to start a policy with them. You can link to the client URL when discussing insurance company reviews, because the URL links to a review page. Your audience is people who own electronics that they want to protect.

Title: 37564 - # Ways to Make Your Rental Feel Like Home
Direction: 500 Words. In 3-6 subheaders, list different ways that you could make a rental feel like home. Whether it's an apartment or a house, there are still a lot of things that you can do to a rental to make it feel like its yours. The site this article will be placed on talks a lot about DIY and home decor. So talk about different DIY projects or decorating options that can make it feel personalized. Things like painting statement walls, putting up removable wallpaper, or hanging personal photographs could be good examples. You can also talk about how even though you don't own the home, it's still important to keep it and your personal belongings safe. Suggest shopping for a renter's insurance plan to keep you protected from things like flooding, fire, etc. You can place the client URL in the section where you talk about renter's insurance. The URL links to a review page, so discuss the importance of comparing the reviews on different insurance providers before making a decision. Your target audience is people who rent vs. own their homes or apartments.

Title: 37569 - # Ways To Start Creating Financial Stability
Direction: 500 Words. List 3-6 different things that someone could do to start creating financial stability. Your audience is people who are looking to create financial stability.

Title: 37580 - The Ultimate Guide to Keeping Your Smartphone Looking Brand New
Direction: 500 words: Make a list of three to six ways that smartphone owners can keep their phones in perfect condition. Things like screen protectors, study waterproof cases, keeping it indoors during outside activities, etc. You can also discuss how if you do happen accidentally shatter your screen, etc., you can replace it with smartphone insurance. You can place the client link in the section where you talk about smartphone insurance and how looking at reviews is helpful in choosing an insurance. Your target audience is smartphone owners.
